model

Class Playlist

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Playlist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Playlist
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Brian Wehrle, Patrick Maley Class Description: The object that stores the songs being played. Songs are played in a FIFO order, in typical Queue fashion. Supports standard Queue operations like add, remove, and peek.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static Playlist makePlayCollection(Playlist savedList)
